doctitle.textblock: Advisory Committee on the Medical Uses of Isotopes: Meeting Notice

summary.textblock: The meeting of the Advisory Committee on the Medical Uses of Isotopes (ACMUI) scheduled for February 24, 1994, has been canceled. The notice for this meeting appeared in the
The next meeting of the ACMUI will be held on May 19 and 20, 1994. Information regarding this meeting will be noticed no less than 15 days before the meeting.

further.textblock: Sally L. Merchant, Office of Nuclear Material Safety and Safeguards, MS 6-H-3, U.S. Nuclear Regulatory Commission, Washington, DC 20555, Telephone (301) 504-2637.
